sqlMap.insert: insert into enrollment(enrollment_no, enrollment_start_date, student_no, course_no) values(enrollment_seq.nextval, sysdate, #student.no#, #course.no#)
sqlMap.select:
select A.enrollment_no as no, A.enrollment_start_date as startDate, C.student_no as "student.no", B.course_no as "course.no"
from enrollment A, course B, student C where A.STUDENT_NO = C.STUDENT_NO and A.COURSE_NO = B.COURSE_NO order by A.ENROLLMENT_NO asc
